PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Thermogravimetric analysis ( TGA ) indicated that PBDT-TDPP-S has high thermal stability with a degradation temperature ( T d ) of 364 째C at 5% weight loss.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) |
| degradation temperature (Td) |
| 5% weight loss |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)", "degradation temperature (Td)", and "5% weight loss". These entities are mentioned as properties of the material PBDT-TDPP-S.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| degradation temperature (Td) |

The only clear "Material property" entity in the paragraph is "degradation temperature (Td)". The other entities, "Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)" and "5% weight loss", are not clearly material properties. Thermogravimetric analysis is a method used to determine the thermal stability of a material, and "5% weight loss" is a condition under which the degradation temperature is measured. However, they are not properties of the material itself.
